query:
ALTER TABLE course_enrollments 
ADD COLUMN paymentType ENUM('one_time', '3_month', '6_month', '12_month') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'one_time',
ADD COLUMN stripeSubscriptionId VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN subscriptionStatus ENUM('active', 'cancelled', 'past_due', 'none') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none';
